name.ja: <ruby>終刻竜機ⅩⅢ<rt>ドゥームズ・オーバー</rt></ruby>－グラフレイオ

text.en:
3 Level 5 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "DoomZ XIII Over - Graflario" by using 1 "DoomZ" Xyz Monster you control (transfer its materials). You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "DoomZ" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, then you can destroy 1 card on the field. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 non-Xyz "DoomZ" monster from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "DoomZ XIII Over - Graflario" once per turn.
